titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to designate Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, as part of the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/20/2000--Introduced. Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1985 to add Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.
